thread.title: Airbus taps Siemens executive to run defense business
thread.title_full: Airbus taps Siemens executive to run defense business | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Airbus taps Siemens executive to run defense business
text:
PARIS Airbus Group ( AIR.PA ) on Tuesday named Siemens ( SIEGn.DE ) executive Dirk Hoke as the next head of its Defence and Space division.
Hoke, 46, will join Europe's largest aerospace group in January and progressively take over from Bernhard Gerwert, who is due to retire in mid-2016, Airbus said in a statement.
Hoke, a former Renault research engineer, heads Siemens' Customer Services Division, according to the German industrial group's website.
(Reporting by Tim Hepher , Editing by Andrew Callus)
